textBox.richText: I Am Cell, We Are Zeitgeist: 8/29/08

Here's the link for the show: http://www.kdvs.org/shows/view/show_id/527/date/2008-08-29/ all future shows will be posted on here, and soon, there will be series links on the left, as well as subject links... you'll get the idea once I do that... ummm, sorry for the late post on the show, but hopefully I'll be more punctual in the future.  I only got around to ripping the CDs today.  Now that I have a system set-up though, this should run fairly smoothly.  If I'm online, just tell me to open up mojo, and everything is accessible.  As last week, I have put my recommendations of the week in their own playlist, and the show achieves are there as well, if anyone wants to listen to my older shows... so yeah, all that is through mojo. Here are the new adds: Los Campesinos! - Hold on Now, Youngster Caribou - Andorra Battles - Mirrored LCD Soundsystem - Sound of Silver Air - The Virgin Suicides Animal Collective - Strawberry Jam Band of Horses - Everything All the Time OK Ikumi - Spirits Phish - A Picture of Nectar Justice - Cross
